summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1994 OLDSMOBILE BRAVADA.  WHENEVER THE CONTACT DRIVES OVER A DAMP PATCH ON THE ROAD AND APPLIES THE BRAKES, THE BRAKE PEDAL EXTENDS ALL THE WAY TO THE FLOOR.  AS A RESULT, THE BRAKING DISTANCE INCREASED.  THE FAILURE HAS OCCURRED NUMEROUS TIMES WHILE DRIVING 45 MPH.  THROUGH ONLINE RESEARCH, THE CONTACT FOUND RECALLS AND TSB'S ON HIS VEHICLE FOR THE SAME FAILURE.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT HIS VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 99I006000 (SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC:ANTILOCK); THEREFORE, NOTHING COULD BE DONE.  THE CONTACT BELIEVES THAT HIS VEHICLE SHOULD BE INCLUDED AND REPAIRED FOR FREE SINCE THE FAILURES ARE IDENTICAL.  THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 110,000 AND CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 130,000.

MY PROBLEM IS WITH THE TURN SIAGNAL SWITCH IN GM CAR INCLUDING THE CUTLASS MONTE CARLO AND GRAND PRIX FROM 94 TO AT LEAST 95 OR 96 IN WITCH THE SWITCH FAILS AND YOU WIND UP WITH NO BRAKE LIGHTS OR TURN SINGALS I KNOW THIS IS A MAJOR PROBLEM BECAUSE MORE THAN ONE PERSON IN THE JACKSONVILLE IL. AREA THAT I HAVE MET HAS HAD THE SAME PROBLEM ONE CAUSING A MULTI CAR CRASH! PERSONNAL I HAD SMOKE COMING FROM THE STEERING COLUM IJUST WANT SOMEONE TO BE AWARE BECAUSE YOU DON'T KNOW TIL SOMEONE POINTS IT OUT OR GETS HURT THE DATE THAT I REALIZED WHAT WAS GOING ON I AM UN SURE OF BUT IT IS HIGHLY COMMON I HAVE HAD THREE CAR WITH THE SAME PROBLEM.  *AK

FUEL PUMP/ AFTER DRIVING UP A HILL I WENT TO MERGE INTO A LANE, MY CAR STALLED LOSING ALL POWER AS A CAR NEARLY RE -ENDED US I QUICKLY STARTED IT AGAIN TO IMMEDIATEDLY STALL AGAIN. TOW TRUCK CAME AND IT SITS AT THE HOUSE UNTIL I GET SOME ANSWERS.  I ALSO DON'T UNDERSTAND ABOUT THE EGR VALVE RECALL I HAD REPLACED 4 TIMES BUT IT IS NOT LISTED ON THE RECALL LIST (AKA) SILENT RECALL. HOW MANY MORE ARE MISSING? *AK

FRONT IMPACT TO SUV LEADING TO ENGINE BURSTING INTO FLAMES, KILLING OCCUPANT! FUEL LINES RUPTURED AND SPRAYED HOT MOTOR WITH PRESSURIZED FUEL! DRIVER WAS ALIVE AFTER IMPACT! DRIVER COULD NOT EXIT SUV DUE TO BODY DAMAGE FROM IMPACT! IN WHICH SUV BURST INTO FLAMES BURNNING DRIVER ALIVE!*AK

CONSUMER STATED THAT WHEN DRIVING AT HIGH SPEEDS THERE WERE BRAKE PROBLEMS.  DEALER NOTIFIED.   *AK   THE PROBLEM WAS WITH THE ABS BRAKES SENSORS ON THE FRONT WHEELS.  AS THE DIRT GUARD RUSTED, PARTICLES OF THE PLATE HAD FALLEN AND RUINED THE SPEED SENSOR AND CAUSED FALSE SIGNALS TO THE COMPUTER WHICH LOCKED THE BRAKE PEDAL.   *SCC    *JB

THE BRAKE LIGHT INDICATION FLASHED WHILE DRIVING, AND WHEN THE BRAKES WERE  DEPRESSED, THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE.   *AK   THE YELLOW ABS LIGHT BLINKED, THEN THE RED BRAKE LIGHT BLINKED WHEN THECONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO STOP THE VEHICLE.  THE CONSUMER FOUND ON THE INTERNET, THAT THE PLUGGED FILTERS IN THE HYDRO/ELECTRIC ABS UNIT MUST BE REPLACED WITH THE NEW MODIFIED UNIT.   *SCC
THE VEHICLES ACCELERATOR STUCK AND CAUSED THE VEHICLE TO SURGE EVEN WITH THE PARKING BRAKE APPLIED.  THE CONSUMER STATED THAT TWO DAYS LATER THE ACCELERATOR WAS STILL STUCK AND TIRES JUST SPIN.  *NLM
CAR JACK BENT CAUSING VEHICLE TO CRASH ONTO FRAME. *MR

AT 13 MPH, THE CONSUMER APPLIED THE BRAKES AND THE ENGINE REVVED, THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED UP TO 68 MPH.  AS SOON AS THE CONSUMER TOOK HER FOOT OFF THE BRAKES THE ENGINE REVVED UP.  THE VEHICLE HIT A FIRE TRUCK, THE CONSUMER SUFFERED INJURIES TO FACE, AND 5 OTHER PEOPLE WERE INJURED IN THE CRASH.  THE VEHICLE WAS TOTALLED.  *AK  *SCC

TIRE BLEW OUT COMPLETELY; THE SIDE TOTALLY BLEW AWAY FROM THE TIRE; MY SON WAS DRIVING DOWN I25 AT 75MPH AND HE HEARD AN EXPLOSION AND THE VEHICLE STARTED SWERVING AND HE GOT IT PULLED OVER AND STOPPED. HE HAD JUST STARTED TO PASS ANOTHER SMALLER VEHICLE.*AK

THE DRIVER HAS EXPERIENCED SEVERAL INTERMITTENT BRAKE FAILURES WHILE DRIVING NONE OF WHICH HAVE RESULTED IN AN ACCIDENT, THE DEALER REPLACED THE SPEED SENSOR BUT THE BRAKE FAILURE REOCCURED THREE WEEKS LATER.NLM

THE DRIVER HAS EXPERIENCED SEVERAL INTERMITTENT BRAKE FAILURES WHILE DRIVING NONE OF WHICH HAVE RESULTED IN AN ACCIDENT, THE DEALER REPLACED THE SPEED SENSOR BUT THE BRAKE FAILURE REOCCURED THREE WEEKS LATER.NLM

components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL
summary: THROTTLE CABLE BECAME STUCK IN THE OPEN POSTION, ALLOWING  VEHICLE TO SUDDENLY AND UNEXPECTEDLY ACCELERATE, RESULTING IN A COLLISION. CONSUMER STATED THAT  PROBLEM HAS HAPPENED THREE TIMES. MECHANIC REMOVED A RUBBER PIECE STUCK IN  AIR INTAKE.    *AK  BELT AND  WATER PUMP FAILED AND REPLACED.  *YH

CONSUMER WAS ATTEMPTING TO MAKE A NORMAL STOP AT 15MPH ,APPLIED BRAKES  AND VEHICLE TOOK AT LEAST TWICE AS LONG TO STOP.ENGINE TURNED OFF WHILE VEHICLE WAS TRYING TO STOP. CONSUMER WILL BE CONTACTING A MECHANIC TO DETERMINE CAUSE.   *AK  MASTER CYLINDER HAD TO BE REPLACED.   *SLC
WIPERS WILL COME ON INTERMITTENTLY WHEN ON LOW OR HIGH OR COMPLETLY STOP IN MIDDLE OF WINDSHIELD, THEY WILL COME ON WHEN WIPER SWITCH IS IN OFF POSITION THIS HAPPENS MOST WHEN VEHICLE IS WET .
NO SUMMARY
BRAKES FAILED TO STOP CAR.  REAL HARD TO PUSH DOWN.  *AK

ON OCCASION, BRAKES FAILS AND ENGINE REVS WHEN BRAKES ARE USED AT SLOW SPEEDS.  I THOUGHT THERE WAS A RECALL ON THIS IN AUGUST 1999, BUT I NEVER RECEIVED ANYTHING.  IT WAS ON THE NEWS.  THERE IS NO SPECIAL TIME THIS OCCURS, NOR IS THERE ANY WARNING BEFORE IT HAPPENS.  *AK
THE EGR VALVE FAILURE CAUSED THE FUEL PRESSURE REGULATOR AND INJECTOR UNIT TO FAIL, PRIOR TO RECALL NOTIFICATION.  YH

ONGOING PROBLEM WITH A  FUSE  SHORTING OUT,  CAUSING ALL INTERIOR LIGHTS/POWER TRUNK/ POWER MIRRORS/ HORN, AND FOG LIGHTS TO  CONTINUALLY BLOW OUT WITHIN A WEEK OR LESS. DEALER NOTIFIED AND REPLACED FUSE. ALSO,  INFORMED CONSUMER THAT EVERYTHING WAS  OKAY,  BUT WOULD NOT RUN AN ELECTRICAL TEST.  *AK
COSNUMER  HAS TO STAND ON BRAKES TO GET THEM TO STOP VEHICLE.  BRAKES DO NOT STOP VEHICLE THE WAY THAT THEY SHOULD.  TOOK VEHICLE TO DEALER, AND THEY ARE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM.  *AK

THERE IS A RECALL ON THE SAME BRAKE SYSTEM FOR BLAZERS BUT NOT FOR THIS AUTO.  THERE IS A TECH BULLITEN.  BUT THIS PROBLEM HAPPENS ALL THE TIME WHEN STOPPING ON A BUMPY SURFACE.  THE BRAKES FAIL & THIS PROBLEM NEEDS TO BE CORRECTED.  I WANT TO KNOW WHY THERE IS A RECALL ON THE BLAZERS WITH THE SAME BRAKE SYSTEM BUT NOT FOR THE OLDSMOBILES?  *AK
WHILE DRIVING  AND APPLYING BRAKES,  VEHICLE EXPERIENCES  EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE. *AK
THERE IS A SEVICE BULLETIN ABOUT THIS & I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHAT TO DO. NO SAFETY DEFECT LISTED IN SUMMARY. *AK
THERE IS A SEVICE BULLETIN ABOUT THIS & I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW WHAT TO DO. NO SAFETY DEFECT LISTED IN SUMMARY. *AK
SAME PROBLEM--SEE SERVICE BULLETIN NUMBER: 566305, FIRST REAIR DONE AT OWNER'S EXPENSE, GM OFFERED NO RELIEF TO CORRECT THE SAME PROBLEM.  NO SAFETY DEFECT LISTED WITHIN SUMMARY.  *AK
KELSEY HAYES ABS BRAKES FAILED, FIXED AND FAILED THE FOLLOWING MONTH FEB/2000. *MJS

WHILE DRIVING AT ABOUT 45 MPH CONSUMER TRIED TO AVOID HITTING A DEER, SLAMMED ON BRAKES AND VEHICLE DID NOT SLOW DOWN.   A   FRIEND SCANNED THE VEHICLE AND FOUND THAT THE HYDRAULIC ELECTRICAL CONTROL UNIT NEEDED WORKING ON, AND SPEED SENSORS NEEDED TO BE LOOKED AT. *AK

WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED  ON WET PAVEMENTS PEDAL WENT TO THE FLOOR, RESULTING IN EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE WHICH CAUSED A COLLISION.   DEALER  HAS BEEN NOTIFIED. *AK
WHILE DRIVING  VEHICLE STALLED  AND DIED.  DEALER INSPECTED THE VEHICLE AND DETERMINED THAT THE FUEL PUMP WAS DEFECTIVE.   MANUFACTURER HAS BEEN NOTIFIED.  *AK
WIPER SWICTH SMOKED - REPLACED - NOW WIPERS COME ON WHEN USING TURN SIGNAL/ ABS BRAKES LOCK AT LOW SPEED WHILE TURNING ON BUMPY ROAD/ FRONT DISC BRAKES REPLACED 3 TIMES IN 78,000 MILES

ONGOING / INTERMITTENT PROBLEM WITH  ABS BRAKE. WHEN APPLIED  PEDAL WOULD GO DOWN TO THE FLOOR AND SLOWLY RISE BACK UP. AFTER RETURNING, CONSUMER WOULD HAVE TO PUMP BRAKE PEDAL TO GET VEHICLE TO STOP. THIS POSES A DANGER  OF A VEHICLE COLLISION.  *AK

WHEN PUTTING VEHICLE INTO REVERSE AND APPLING THE BRAKES,  THE BRAKES  GRIND.  *AK

VEHICLE ACCELERATED WITHOUT FOOT ON THE GAS PEDAL.  DRIVER APPLYED THE BRAKES,  BUT THE VEHICLE DID NOT SLOW DOWN UNTIL 15 SECONDS LATER.  MANUFACTURER WAS AWARE OF THE PROBLEM, AND ISSUED A TSB BULLETIN.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION. *YC

BRAKING SYSTEM MALFUNCTIONED, CAUSING EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE. ALSO, WINDSHIELD WIPERS COME  ON WHEN USING THE TURN SIGNAL, OR IF THE VEHICLE GOES OVER ANY BUMPS.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.  *AK

MOLDING AROUND THE DOORS ARE LOOSE. MJS

THERE IS A BANGING NOISE COMING FROM  VEHICLE WHEN STOPPING OR STARTING.  VEHICLE ALSO SHAKES WHEN THIS HAPPENS.  THE BALL JOINTS WERE REPLACED TWO YEARS AGO  BECAUSE OF THIS REASON WITH AROUND 19,000 MILES. 26,000 LATER, PROBLEM IS BACK. THE DEALER IS AWARE OF THIS PROBLEM. WHILE TRYING TO STOP  VEHICLE  BRAKE PEDAL DOESN'T LOSE PRESSURE. BUT WHEN APPLYING BRAKES,  VEHICLE JUST KEEPS ROLLING AND HAS TO COAST TO A STOP. DEALER HAS BEEN CONTACTED, AND HAS BEEN UNABLE TO LOCATE THE PROBLEM. *AK *ML
WITHOUT WARNING THE BRAKES FAILED, THE PEDAL WENT ALL THE WAY DOWN AND I BARELY AVOIDED A REAR-ENDER

SINCE VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED HAD BEEN IN & OUT DEALER FOR ABS BRAKES. THEY FAIL TO STOP VEHICLE PROPERLY. MAKE A LOT OF NOISE WHEN  APPLIED. BRAKE PEDAL GOES TO THE FLOOR. ALSO PREMATURE WEAR OF LEFT FRONT BRAKE PADS.   *AK

ABS BRAKE SYSTEM; INTERMITTENTLY; WHEN STOPPING AT A STOP SIGN, APPLIES THE BRAKES AND THE TRUCK PROCEEDS THROUGH THE STOP SIGN,  STOPPING AFTERWARDS. EARLIER COULD NOT FIND PROBLEM WITH BRAKES. *AK

WHILE DRIVING 5MPH THE VEHICLE BRAKING SYSTEM FAILED,  CAUSING AN ACCIDENT WITH ANOTHER VEHICLE.  PRIOR TO THIS ACCIDENT, DEALER REPLACED PADS, BRAKE PART, TIRES, ETC AND THE BRAKES SYSTEM STILL FAILED.  DEALER CANNOT DETERMINE THE PROBLEM.   *AK

WHILE DRIVING NOTICED BATTERY APPEARED ON DASH, THEN SUDDENLY VEHICLE SHUT DOWN, COASTED DOWN RAMP TO GAS STATION, UPON WALKING AWAY ENGINE COMPARTMENT BURST INTO FLAMES, INSURANCE INVESTIGATORS DETERMINED ALTERNATOR FAILURE AS CAUSE.   *AK
